item.title: Getting started with jstl
item.description: Installation # JSTL is part of the Java EE API and included in Java EE application servers such as WildFly, TomEE, GlassFish, but not in barebones servletcontainers such as Tomcat and Jetty. JSTL are the taglibs which you import from http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/* namespace. JSTL must not be confused with a “custom JSP tag library” (wherein you define a .tld file yourself). JSTL must also not be confused with taglibs of 3rd party frameworks such as JSF, Spring MVC, Struts, Displaytag, etcetera.
